title: Linked Schemas
description: A list of schemas against which a profile must be validated (schema names must be alphanumeric with underscore(_) spacers and dash(-) version separator, e.g., my_data_schema-v1.0.0)

metadata.purpose: This field is required in all Murmurations schemas to ensure that a profile is valid and can be posted to the Index. It is the only required field in the default-v2.0.0 schema, which is the schema used by the Index to process incoming profiles.
